data.description: Microarray slide to plate-well list utility
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This utility module is generally useful for scientists using
    2-color microarray technology. It's purpose is to provide a source
    destination list of the DNA spotted on a slide. The module does not
    interface with a database, an arrayer or any other instrumentation,
    but calculates the mappings on-the-fly based on array design
    parameters. It is unique in this regard.
